did.unittitle: U.S. Congressional Hearings on the Plumb Plan on Microfiche,
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Materials on U.S. Congressional hearings regarding federal ownership of American railroad per the Plumb Plan.

scopecontent.p: This collection consists of microfiche copies of materials from U.S. Congressional hearings regarding federal ownership of American railroad per the Plumb Plan. From the Congressional Record, volumes 232 and 233, 66th Congress, 1919-1921.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: U.S. Congressional Hearings on the Plumb Plan on Microfiche #5708m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

did.unittitle: U.S. Congressional hearings regarding the Plumb Plan

scopecontent.p: Microfiche copies of volumes 232 and 233 of the U.S. Congressional Hearings for the 41st-73 Congress, 1869-1934.
